        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

                    Not everyone likes the branding and bottle design
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">29</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">358</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May not be suitable for religious individuals
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>

class="brand">Initio Parfums Prives</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Atomic Rose</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/High-Frequency-42259.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.42259.jpg"alt="High Frequency Initio Parfums Prives" width="125" class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2366687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366687" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aphrodisiacalex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343314"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2343314.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aphrodisiacalex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343314">aphrodisiacalex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>[8.8/10] <br />
<br />
Initially, this fragrance took some time to resonate with me, but once it did, I found it to be one of the best boozy fragrances I have encountered. On my first impression, I detected a rather strange cherry/grape note that did not appeal to me. However, after purchasing it, I was curious to see if my perception would change, and indeed it did  I have come to thoroughly enjoy it. <br />
<br />
The opening is quite intriguing; it presents a fresh aroma at first, then evolves beautifully into a captivating blend of rum and cinnamon, which is simply remarkable. Although I find the price somewhat steep, if able to acquire it at a more reasonable price, it is undoubtedly worth the investment. <br />
<br />
The projection may not be the most assertive in a crowded space, yet it remains distinctly noticeable. On my skin, it lasts approximately 5 to 7 hours before fading. One of the aspects I particularly appreciate about this fragrance is that it is one of the few that does not render me nose-blind, allowing me to consistently savor its presence as I move.<br />
<br />
[Sillage 8.1/10]<br />
[Longevity 7.7/10]<br />
[Gender / Perfectly Unisex]<br />
[Scent profile/Uniqueness 9.8/10]<br />
[Price 6/10]</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2366687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2366687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361595" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mehmedgyunel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1405741.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mehmedgyunel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405741">mehmedgyunel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 03:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Idk if it's only me but the drydown of this fragrance smells extremely close to Lattafa Khamrah. Maybe it's just my nose and I'm not saying that in bad way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2361595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2361595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359013" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mattsco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943773"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1943773.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mattsco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ani-X-80464.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80464.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ani X"title="Ani X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943773">mattsco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p><b>[9.4/10] Hall of Fragrance Fame</b><br />
<br />
One of the best going out/date night fragances of all time, period.<br />
<br />
The blend is perfect. The scent is smoothly balanced, giving a warm, sophistacated, and alluring vibe. It just smells like you have your shit together, and people like that. It will last the night but wont be overpowering in the air for close encounters, and should not be beast mode for those complaints. If this doesn't boost your confidence with a fresh fade, then nothing will.<br />
<br />
You will 100% be the best smelling person in a room filled with JPG Elixers and Eros. Worth the money. Easily a forever fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2359013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2359013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2354322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354322" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheFraganist55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029669.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheFraganist55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669">TheFraganist55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Side Effect has taken the fragrance world by storm, and for good reason. It screams quality. However, as some have said, there are simply better boozy/tobacco fragrances out there. And for cheaper than this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2354322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2354322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dry Down: Warm &amp; Sweet Vanilla Esk, Inviting Presence, Boozy and Sophisticated, Rich Dark Chocolate.<br />
<br />
Sillage: 8.5/10 <br />
Longevity: 9/10 <br />
Complexity: 9/10<br />
Gender: Predominantly Masculine, however reasonable grounds for unisex.<br />
<br />
Easily a Top 3 Favourite &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2353568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2353568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351131" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Performance 8/10.<br />
<br />
Price 5/10.<br />
<br />
Masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2351131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2351131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350678" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
First impression is candy and some rum drink. Smells like a bar and a bit boring. I don't get the hype around this one.<br />
<br />
Free dabber sample from Lucky Scent. Wore at home. Would not purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2350532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2350532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344622" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sgd11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sgd11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632">sgd11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good quality sweet tobacco scent. However, I do NOT understand the hype. Its just okay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2344622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2344622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344614" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShhhDeus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2194368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShhhDeus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344614ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344614" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194368">ShhhDeus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 16:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts out sweet cherry and almost like grape juice/extract. Quickly dries down to a tobacco vanilla scent, with slight booziness. Very quick dry down, becomes skin scent very fast. The smell is not very good or impressing when dried down, it's not bad. Just very bad performance for me, and not the most attractive of smells. The opening is nice almost like a TF lost cherry. I herd that its easy to go nose blind to so maybe thats why I feel like the performance is lacking<br />
<br />
Edit: Been trying it out more and giving it a chance. Its really nice and fruity. Fuitynes has something Blond Amber esc</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2344614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2344614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344308" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wafflepuffs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wafflepuffs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517239">Wafflepuffs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like the others have mentioned, there is a cherry/gummy date note in here that doesn't seem to be listed, and it's quite prominentmaybe there is no fruit and it's a sweet saffron and tobacco mixing? it's just so odd. I think it's a nice scent, but the main focus isn't rum-tobacco forward as I'd liked. The fruit note not being listed is just so odd to me and if you're going in blind, it'll definitely throw you off. Not blind buy safe, in my opinion. Otherwise it's a nice fragrance, i'd say it's worth the niche title, just make sure it's for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2344308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2344308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338955" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="reuben606fg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082553.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="reuben606fg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Intense-Oud-32743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Oud"title="Intense Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338955ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338955" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082553">reuben606fg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i need this 10/10  dont last long tho unles u get an over 3 year old batch</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2338955"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2338955#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tiam4648"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2275968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tiam4648" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2275968">Tiam4648</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>first review lol. <br />
(20 y/o Male for context)<br />
<br />
First tried this fragrance at the mall cus of the hype, did smell like a cherry bomb tbh, thats perhaps why people say it smells medicinal. I tried a lot of fragrances that day but it was odd how it was kinda meh to me but I had some sort of affinity to it maybe the hype brain washed me . <br />
<br />
I then pulled the trigger and bought side effect. and something crazy happened. <br />
<br />
I got a batch from nov 23 and this thing smells absolutely magical, i have absolute aphrodisiac from initio ,which im in love with, but this is such a competitor. But after falling in love with A.A.<br />
, my opinion on this fragrance (and opinion only) is your batch is perhaps the biggest factor. <br />
<br />
This fragrance on me first of all has way better projection than I thought, i sprayed a half spray on my wrist and a normal spray on my right wrist just to test and when I went downstairs my father told me the whole house smells sweet. Even afterwards just sitting on me, its not one of the fragrances where you need to consciously sniff up to recognize it reveals itself. Best part though for anyone who doesnt like those strong fragrances, while it is an extremely sweet / boozy scent its still a very natural,  high quality, well blended scent which is hard to get offended by. Like this isnt your headache inducing scent, the best analogy i got is going to the fair and while the smell of the food is very loud and strong its quite pleasant to have. <br />
<br />
The longevity is a bit of a puzzle because this projects so hard that its difficult to tell the difference between nose blind and longevity, but to me this has a good longevity but dont take my word for it because where i live is hot and that makes a big difference. <br />
<br />
The scent. To my nose, when i smell this very very consciously, it does smells like rum and saffron mainly. with a quick wiff, it does smell like a cherry bomb. Best way to describe is those cherry halls cough drops. Now dont let that put you off, its not because of a cherry note, its just so well blended that it took all these dark notes (tobacco, rum, cinnamon, &amp; sandalwood)  and blended it beautifully to give this sweet yet dark background. It does smell like a cherry cough drop to me but its done in the most alluring way you can only know my trying it. As it dries down the tobacco goes from 10% existent to 25% existent in the smell, but thats the only main difference in the dry down for me. But my God is this addictive. The main thing I like about the smell is what I love most about initios fragrances, the quality is what makes this stand out, its absolutely natural smelling which isnt as good as A.A. but if you told someone this is what you just naturally smell like you can fool them. Such well blended high quality ingredients gives you the impression that the person just naturally smells good like that but thats why I think the cherry vibe to me is so good because it smells natural and inoffensive (like the fair food analogy)<br />
<br />
Overall: <br />
You may mixed reviews on this fragrance which is understandable because it retails for $370, but to me the fragrance I have on is not the one i smelled in the mall. I really think the polarity comes from the batches people were given so i think thats something you gotta pray to God to assist you on. But would I recommend this? I personally love gourmand and more specifically gourmand vanilla fragrances, and to me while smelling not vanilla at all and gourmand at a huge stretch the sweetness i get to me is lovely and so if youre into those sweeter scents I def think youd love this. If you take an honest look at your collection or personal favorites and theyre not on average boozy or sweet, i will say you might not like this cus it really leans heavy on that side but just based on mass appeal that ive noticed still try it out if you can before blind buying cus of the price. <br />
<br />
Smell: 9.5/10 (on my top 3 scents)<br />
Projection: 8/10 (arab fragrances raise the bar unfortunately)<br />
Longevity: 6/10 (take with a grain of salt due to nose blindness, better to test on urself first)<br />
<br />
A- for me, just cus of arab fragrances raised my expectations with performance/longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2335959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2335959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334895" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334895" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GerrittP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="GerrittP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334895ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334895" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298017">GerrittP</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 15:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've only recently started paying attention to fine fragrances, but I've been smelling things my whole life. ;)<br />
<br />
I don't have the experience, knowledge, or verbiage to express myself in the sophisticated manner that so many others do on this website. I hope that you, Reader, will forgive my ignorance. <br />
<br />
To my noob nose, Side Effect hits more feminine than masculine. There is a powdery note that feels like it would be at home in an old lady's perfume. However, this is meant to be a unisex scent, which is confusing to me.<br />
<br />
I also own Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille and it feels as if the two fragrances are two sides of the same coin. Except Tobacco Vanille is the masculine version with a much more tobacco forward profile. Side Effect dials up the powdery note at the expense of the tobacco. As a middle aged man, I will take Tobacco Vanille 10 times out of 10. I can totally see how the reverse may be true for someone that has a different demographic than myself. And I leave room for the scent to grow on me as my palate matures.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2334895"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2334895#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323774" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aqua-di-alex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aqua-di-alex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Profondo"title="Acqua di Gi Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090833">Aqua-di-alex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 08:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honest review - Online, side effect gets very varied opinions but usually they are positive, and rightfully so. If you like a very sweet spicy fragrance then this is for you.. its boozy but not as boozy as it looks on the notes, especially in the opening, more sweet cinnamon and vanilla than rum in my opinion at first.. Price tag is absolutely reasonable in my opinion as its very high quality and always gets compliments. Longevity on my skin is 10+ hours but I think its a fragrance you can easily go nose blind to and that's why everyone says its bad longevity. Silliage great for 7+ hours then dries down to a more boozy skin scent, that's when the rum is most prominent. 10/10 fragrance and a safe blind buy, you wont be disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069581">desertdweller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 17:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am in love. This is like dry woods with cinnamon and just a hint of sweetness from the rum although this eally isn't boozy. There are some similarities to ombre leather from saffron perhaps. It stays pretty consistent throughout. Unlike others I don't get any fruit, just the notes listed, very unisex, great for woody lovers, perfect for crunching through autumn leaves. I don't want to like this because it is so expensive but it is truly intoxicating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2319204"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2319204#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317258" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jambu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jambu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317258ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317258" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763">jambu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 02:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Surprisingly fruity? I get grape, cherries, very slight vanilla, and a little bit of tobacco. The grape and cherries that i'm getting are very prominent to me? Despite them not being listed on the notes at all. Even though this fragrance is fruity to me, this isn't a summer/hot weather fragrance. Perfect for the fall, winter, or night time. Very unisex imo. Great performance as well. <br />
<br />
Overall a very good fragrance with amazing performance. Just don't expect it to smell like the notes listed. <br />
<br />
Scent: 5/5<br />
Performance: 4.5/5<br />
Price: 2.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2317258"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2317258#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; These words are often overused when describing fragrances but intito have truly captured it with this. great longevity. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2315747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2315747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314468" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karapar13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753349.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karapar13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pana-Dora/Aqua-de-Dora-68462.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68462.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua de Dora"title="Aqua de Dora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753349">karapar13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like Layton, this one had to grow on me over time, since initially I did find it nice but nothing special. Spicy heaven, you can really distinguish the notes from themselves (other than sandalwood and hedione, because I don't know what hedione smells like). Cinnamon with plump boozy notes, tobacco as well. Statement maker for sure, really nice projection and really good longevity (10-13hrs) from the older batches, newer batches toned down the intensity of the fragrance with dumbed down projection (nothing crazy though) but performance is still the same. Great winter staple for evenings out, put your noses on this if you haven't already! 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2314468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2314468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313363" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rivzy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1957060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1957060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rivzy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2313363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2313363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1957060">Rivzy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very dark and bold fragrance best suited for winter nights. Longevity and silage are great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2313363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2313363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311580" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ASTROMAGIC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881077.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ASTROMAGIC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881077">ASTROMAGIC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lord have mercy, this fragrance is truly so intoxicating. <br />
<br />
I legitimately feel like I'm being hypnotized when I smell this. It is actually relaxing me. The opening has plenty of cherry and vanilla, with the rum and cinnamon swiftly coming in to steal the show. For me, it feels like the tobacco is playing a supportive role in this fragrance. I've had a chance to try several tobacco scents now and it's fascinating how differently they are all executed.<br />
<br />
This is an aphrodisiac. 'My eyes are up here' in a bottle.<br />
<br />
Longevity: 9/10 (On clothes and on skin)<br />
Sillage: 10/10<br />
Scent: 9/10 <br />
Presentation: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2311580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2311580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308082" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ryantramus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1812263.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ryantramus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/Blonde-Amber-73595.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73595.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blonde Amber"title="Blonde Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812263">ryantramus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 14:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this to work once. A co-worker arrived 45 minutes later and could still smell me from when I walked in the doors. She didn't realize it was me until she had walked several hundred yards and through a few corridors and hallways and got within 20 yards of our offices. This is nearly my strongest frag thats not an oud. And it smells gorgeous. She has a broken tear duct, so her eye watered for an hour straight, despite me leaving the room and staying in the lab the next 2 hours. <br />
<br />
She still smelled it in the halls the next day. And mine is a new bottle, only 82 or 83% concentration. Anyone with longevity issues needs to drink some water or something. <br />
<br />
Beast mode, amazing scent, attractive on men and women, can't go wrong. Find it on the grey market on reddit or Facebook for $200 and it's one of the best values for performance and profile you can buy. Top 5 scent for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2308082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2308082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I get immediate hints of Cherry, Rose, and Vanilla . Ironically, I sprayed some on my daughters hand yesterday and asked if she liked it. She said yea and says, you know what it smells like? Great Scent overall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2302984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2302984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SoheePark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.924022.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SoheePark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-of-BO/Bombon-92543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombon"title="Bombon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022">SoheePark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 09:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful scent perfect for fall. My favourite out of the carnal collection.<br />
Why are people complaining about the CHERRY note when there is absolutely none? So many people confusing Side Effect with Narcotic Delight and it shows!<br />
This is a warm cinnamon + sweet tobacco + rum scent. Get your facts right.<br />
I am going to drench myself in this all cold months long.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2302401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2302401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The way the sweetness and vanilla in this works is the same as ultramale, this is basically niche ultramale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2300101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2300101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229162">Bozojohn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 22:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can anyone tell me what years have a metal atomizer? Read it on a post and although my bottle passes all the minute details it has a metal atomizer<br />
<br />
Fragrance smells pretty good Id give it a 8.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2294250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2294250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dellboy30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dellboy30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506399">dellboy30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has definitely been reformulated but I think in a good way. I had side effect a while ago and sold my bottle because it was so overwhelming would literally make me nauseous the only fragrance I couldn't wear even in the dead of winter. I loved the fragrance but I just couldn't stand how over powering it was... i recently got a sample and Im definitely repurchasing it again but I'll get the 50ml not that they do smaller bottles...its far better In my opinion, it's stil a power house but no longer get the nausea...perfect for me personally but if you preferred the old super strong formulation you might be a lil dissapointed. But I think that this  the newer form is more refined, smoother, wearable and just better</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2292731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2292731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291789" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is so watered-down compared to my old decant of Side-Effect. I am so tired of fragrance houses selling-out and cheapening their great fragrances. I was planning on getting Side-Effect, but changed my mind after testing it out a week ago. It just smells like rubber and some warm spices.<br />
<br />
It seems impossible trying to find an old batch unfortunately, But hopefully I'll get lucky in the near future! padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286513" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xth3hoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="xth3hoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Parfum-50757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Parfum"title="Y Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204376">xth3hoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 21:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>picked up a bottle of this stuff on a Europe trip from the initio store in Paris iv'e previously sampled this master piece and knew i had to get a bottle, where better than the store itself in Paris. This fragrance was love at first sniff it come s on with a lovely classy and elegant white floral and sweet candy like rum with cinnamon and a smooth vanilla as it dries down the tabacco becomes a bit more prominate along with the cinnamon also having a heavy dose of boozy vanilla sandalwood wich make this fragrance the up most sexy , the touch of saffron makes this also classy as i see this fragrance as even versatile on occasions ,weddings or special events, partying and especially date nights, this is my favourite fragrance oat rn and definatly the best date night 11/10. Perfomace wise i don't find that the reformulation to have changed the performance as people say, 6 hrs of projection and over 12 hours waking up the next morning, on the longevity,i have had it stuck in my shirts after a wash for weeks also i have had someone drop my bottle to wich the same week i bought it (i was bought a new one) were i swept up the precious juice on the ground with my underwear, safe to say 4 months later it still stinks up my draw and still certainly there, safe to say performance is still great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2286513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2286513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282009" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sashi34"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205145"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205145.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sashi34" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205145">Sashi34</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got it yesterday and got the reformulated version so im not sure how the original smells like . Off the bat it took me awhile to make out what i was smelling as honestly i was expecting something way different i got hit with rum and more rum and just rum after 5 mins more notes start to appear like the cinnamon and a touch of saffron (super light) after 40mins then the tobacco started to settle in with a very slight hint of vanilla . My first impressions were abit mixed it really took me awhile to figure out what exactly i was smelling but as i took sniff after sniff it just got more alluring and i couldnt stop and now i absolutely love it . My opinion is to give it some time dont judge it off your first impressions and go back again and again after it dries down . Performance wise it wasnt all that strong when i sprayed it a pretty soft fragrance like oajan which i dont particularly hate as i live in an country thats summer all year round makes this fragrance way easier to wear than if it was intoxicatingly strong doesnt project like crazy too which is to be expected for the reformulated batches overall still very happy with my purchase and def recommend sampling before buying as it may not be for everyone</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
