<br />
This is a musk bomb to my nose- much like a spicy, winter version of the fruity musk bomb that is Erba Pura. Despite the massive disconnect between expectation and reality, I do enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2267646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2267646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Make sure you get a sample or smell it first because it can be too boozy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2264318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2264318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264222" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="prettyboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2235422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="prettyboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235422">prettyboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 18:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i smell no booze, i smell no leaf, but do smell hedione,  cinnamon and sandalwood strongly; but maybe i booze too much brandy on ice; ergo i can not find its smell anymore. this smells like powdery sweet makeup that chicks love to wear on their face; ergo chicks love it, and i love them. In short, God is good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2264222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2264222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Last around 10 hours.<br />
Expensive but very worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2262844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2262844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261292" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhillipFries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2200456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhillipFries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200456">PhillipFries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 04:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first got my full-sized bottle, the dry down was what I loved, but now it's actually the opening. <br />
The dry down has started to be just vanilla and rum. Nothing else. But in the opening you get all the notes listed, cinammon, rum, tobacco and vanilla. First time i smelled the opening I got a lot of cherry cough sirup, but now it's just pure addicting.<br />
I wish the opening would last the entirety of this fragrance, but sadly the "boring" vanilla, overpowers it and that's all you get when this fragrance dries down (Atleast to my nose).<br />
But i didn't smell pure vanilla when I first got it, so maybe Side Effect has damaged my nose for being so damn strong ahahahah.<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2261292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2261292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047209">axelsniff86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bozzy warm alluring scent.<br />
After the first 2 hours, the cinnamon begins to shine. Cinnamon mix with a sweet tobacco and a bozzy adictive scent. It will be like that until you wash it off. It's just exquisite. <br />
Last on me, 10 hours on skin, and if you spray it on clothes, it will be until you wash it. Definitely, cold weather is going to be the best. But if you work on a high temperature control site, this will work as well. This will be noticeable all day. It's just beautiful. I try it on a 2 ml decant. But if you got the money, it's full bottle worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2260432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2260432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It opens with a strong mix of rum, vanilla, and tobacco, with a spicy kick of cinnamon. Leather adds a smoky, seductive vibe, while creamy vanilla and sandalwood keep it warm and smooth. Its intense, luxurious, and unafraid to be too much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2259234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2259234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2185284">Laurentum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked up this fragrance two days ago, this one was a side hustle as my first initio fragrance and i thought that it would be nice for winter, but it turned out to a beast fragrance, its strong and the sweetness is inviting and cheerful, not too sweet to handle neither to strong. Very nice but reminds me of other fragrances that has the cinnamon note.<br />
Was it worth the price? If you have an open budget for sure but if not i would recommend something like Stronger with you by Emporio Armani which is half the price but little similar to it.<br />
For me this fragrance is 9/10 very perfect for night times and very sexy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2255275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2255275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255028" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129344">frumunda_chiz!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 05:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes yes yes please. <br />

Ive found great deals on three of them so far, as the only downside is the price!<br />
<br />
Looking to trade a new full bottle if Mystic Experience if anyone is downjust hit me up. <br />

Addictive satisfying scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2255028"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2255028#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tht1Kid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tht1Kid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147448">Tht1Kid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 17:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Editing this for the third time now. I own an old batch and have had several samples of the new batches and here is my thoughts. <br />
Old batch: needs maceration, after you do that its indistinguishable from the new batch. In fact, I thought the new batch was very waxy and had a fruity rum note so I put the cap back on early and its perfect. You can pick out every note easily from opening to dry down however tobacco does tend to make my friend think I smell like cigarettes. I think its a perfect balance though and he doesn't know fragrances. When I first smelled this I thought there was vanilla but it is just the tonka. Its honestly the perfect sweet tobacco fragrance. 9/10 loosing points for making a 15 year old smell like a cigar. <br />
<br />
New Batch: Rum note is synthetic. Its like that you find in Lattafa Khamara but toned down, very fruity and not boozy. Its not a dominant note but it is enough to get you bored or realize its not the greatest right after you pick it up. It also has a waxy smoothness to it that makes it less of a nice cigar and more of a sexy candle. I think if you're wearing this on a date as most people are, its going to be phenomenal and she wont stop smelling you because it has a really good first impression. But if you're wearing this for yourself you may want to go through at least a 5ml sample first. I can't say too much other than try before you buy because I've worn it 3 times and am only smelling my sample from the cap while writing this. I will wear it tomorrow and update again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2254626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2254626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250936" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fountain30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fountain30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521681">Fountain30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 01:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Side Effect but I do have to spray quite a lot of it to get the performance I want. Even with excessive sprays it is a scent bubble fragrance, but this doesnt bother me. I dont want my fragrance to scream as I walk into a room but for the price I would expect a bit more oomph. Also, a few hours into the dry down the booziness disappears and it becomes a fairly boring vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2250936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2250936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247791" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AHM81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AHM81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247345" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thefragfag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198096"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="thefragfag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198096">thefragfag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 20:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SCENT: Intoxicating and boozy tobacco<br />
LONGEVITY/PERFORMANCE: Lasts about 10+ hours and has a big sillage. You will definitely be noticed.<br />
OCCASIONS: Special, cool-weather occasions for sure.<br />
<br />
Rating: 9.5/10, definitely worth the hype</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2247345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2247345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's super well blended to the point where I can't really pick a particular note that's stands out on my skin. It's a very sweet smell but in a very masculine way. It's along the same lines as Clive Christian Blonde Amber in the sense that it's an addictively sweet tobacco and spiced rum fragrance that gets increasingly more potent as it dries down. Love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2243364"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2243364#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143672">captainmitt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 16:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i like this scent. Boozy, somewhat fizzy cherry rum and tobacco. Hints of smoke in the mid. Overall pretty good. I'm hearing it was reformulated and that the earlier batches were beast mode. For me this current version isn't beast mode. It sits close to skin after the first hour. I like the scent profile overall and would pick up a full bottle. I want to try the vintage batches tho to compare. Anyone know where I can get authentic vintage batches?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2232135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2232135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231927" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520331">FragGawd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Thanks  Aaron Terrence Hughes for putting me on to Side Effect years ago. After I saw his reaction I knew I had to atleast sample it. After blowing through the sample in a week I bought a full bottle.<br />
<br />
Vanilla and rummy tobacco heaven or Sex in a bottle. Thats what the girl Im dating said Side Effect was when she smelled it on me. This scent is undefeated for those date night situations. Everyone saying the reformulation killed the performance, Im not experiencing that. I have a 2023 batch and Im getting compliments past 7 hours of me wearing it. The sillage is crazy. It is forsure a  head turner. Side Effect is expensive but its one of the few that I think is worth the price. This is addictively perfect. Side Effect might be my favorite fragrance oat. 10/10 <br />
<br />
Edit: 20/10  From opening to drydown its so addictive. The ultimate compliment puller also. If you havent smelled it at this point stop procrastinating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2229054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2229054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; drydown smells like vanilla and tobacco to me and lingers on my skin after many hours.<br />
im sure the reformulated version isnt as good i think? but overall, the scent should be the same and i love it. abit pricey but if you can get one for cheap like i did, go for it honestly. i chose to buy this over angels share.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
Solid 8.25/10 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2219315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2219315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219313" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudegetsmoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2071768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudegetsmoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Afternoon-Swim-53947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afternoon Swim "title="Afternoon Swim "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071768">dudegetsmoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Way overpriced and way overhyped.<br />
<br />
It's a mature but sharp scent. It has a burnt candle sort of scent, I guess it's the smokiness. As someone who doesn't like tobacco scents, I do still find this nice. But it's definitely a special occasion winter night fragrance, and should never be worn daily. I'd imagine going to a formal dressed up party with mature men wearing this. Not an easy wear by any means, and not a particularly good scent for guys under the age of 25.<br />
<br />
Drydown is super nice though, I can't lie. <br />
<br />
I think it might be worth getting a 50ml bottle, but trust me, you aren't finishing it anytime soon. It's a scent only good for special occasions.<br />
<br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2219313"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2219313#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218986" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaFavaTonta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2193579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaFavaTonta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Body-Paint-60319.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60319.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Body Paint"title="Body Paint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193579">LaFavaTonta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 03:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Io amo il rum, ma questo profumo no. Non il mio genere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2218986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2218986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I also smell a hint of smoke in it - like I'm in a cigar lounge and men are drinking rum and it's heavy and foggy and intoxicating....but not for me - not on me, anyways. Maybe in cooler weather, when I'm not just having a relaxing evening at home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2215772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2215772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2211431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2211431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210519" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UrbanBliss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UrbanBliss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210519ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210519" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180967">UrbanBliss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 20:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im sitting here trying to understand this fragrance and the hype. Hoping and praying that it is nothing more than a few months of macerating. Initial thoughts, smells plasticy, synthetic and just horrible. I am baffled at the price since its up with Tom Ford and Guerlaine ( best fragrances on market in my mind). Ill update you in a few months. The dry down gets a bit better but omg. For  1/3 of the cost you could have purchased Royal Santal by Guerlaine with no macerating necessary. YUK!!!<br />
<br />
Update: Its been a month of macerating. I smell sweet gasoline. It truly is horrible. Im going to give it away. Biggest fragrance regret purchase. I blind bought it based on reviews. Expensive lesson.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2210519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2210519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ajlis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ajlis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474">Ajlis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-05">07/05/24 23:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didnt expect to like Side Effect so much. Im usually drawn to clean, soft, green and woody scents, and Side Effect is something completely different: a sweet, spicy, and powerful saffron bomb. Alongside the saffron, I can strongly detect tobacco and rum, with gentler hints of vanilla, cherry, and cinnamon in the background. None of these notes are usually my favorites, but for some reason, they work beautifully in this fragrance and on my skin. Side Effect is warm, soft, and rich, extremely well-blended, addictive, and sexy. Its absolutely not for office or casual wear, but perfect for parties and date nights in the winter. It has character and doesnt go unnoticed, lingering on the skin all day and becoming softer and sweeter over time. The drydown is my favorite: a beautiful, gently seductive spicy vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2209642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2209642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209438" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JaySentz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995085.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JaySentz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/African-Leather-31383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="African Leather"title="African Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209438ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209438" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085">JaySentz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-05">07/05/24 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see why this is one of Initios most popular fragrances with the sweet boozy nose, but the heavy saffron ruins it a bit for me. The tonka cherry in the opening is pleasing but doesnt stick around long and then its just an ambery saffron that is a bit monotonous to wear.<br />
<br />
But if you dont have the same aversion to sweet boozy saffron as I do I can see how this is seductive. Maybe Ill come around to it like I have some other scents, but there are plenty more richer and complex booze scents that I would rather wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2209438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2209438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My bottle is from 2022 and i get about 5-6 hours with medium projection. And for an expensive niche it should've been much stronger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2205083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2205083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204624" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Erenn_36"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2172446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Erenn_36" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204624ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204624" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172446">Erenn_36</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 06:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>simply magnificent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2204624"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2204624#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sw1707"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sw1707" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907424">sw1707</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 05:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not sure why Fragrantica haven't got vanilla mentioned anywhere in the note breakdown, because it is an official note in this and is very prominent. Sweet, syrupy, boozy.. and dries down into a warm vanilla scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2204573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2204573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202879" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202879" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NOSEYBODY"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NOSEYBODY" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202879ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202879" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259603">NOSEYBODY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 06:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be perfectly honest Side Effect just doesnt smell like what I expected from its notes.<br />
<br />
It opens with a couple of phantom notes. Particularly Cherry &amp; Chocolate. Which I understand any Chocolate note in a Tobacco Fragrance to be a supporting note used in order to enhance the rich &amp; pungent scent of an actual Tobacco note. While Cherry would be used to create the scent of a Cherry Flavored Tobacco. <br />
<br />
The problem. My nose doesnt pick up on an actual Tobacco note. I only pick up on a Tobacco note's supporting notes. <br />
<br />
My nose doesnt pick up on an opening note of Rum. But I do sense a mild indistinguishable booziness.<br />
<br />
The opening smells Gourmand &amp; semi Boozy. Much like a Cherry filled, Liqueur infused, Valentines Day Chocolate.<br />
<br />
I cannot clearly pick up on a note of Cinnamon. Which tells me that Cinnamon was used in order to create a very soft, Vaguely Spiced, Dusty Woodiness. Which I do pick up on.<br />
<br />
The Sandalwood note gives me an almost Lactonic, Almond-like nuance.<br />
<br />
I also pick up on strong notes of Saffron, &amp; Hedione. Which both are to my dismay, adding an overall synthetic feel to this fragrance. <br />
<br />
Saffron can sometimes smell spiced, or it can smell like mock Leather. In this fragrance the Saffron note smells like mock Leather. <br />
<br />
In general I love Saffron's mock Leather nuances. But I dont like it here due to it mingling with the note of Hedione.<br />
<br />
Hedione is an aroma chemical that is alleged to smell similar to Jasmine... &amp; it does not IMO. <br />
<br />
The Hedione note here smells like an unnecessary added chemical thats cheapening the overall composition of this fragrance. Causing it to smell like it was created with full synthetics. <br />
<br />
So how does Initio's "Side Effect" smell ? <br />
<br />
It smells like "Sweet Synthetics" desperately trying to find a direction. Which to a common nose that cant understand the depth &amp; complexity of Niche Fragrances will love. <br />
<br />
Does it smell good ????<br />
<br />
Yes, surprisingly it smells good. And it does garner compliments. But IMO, Side Effect smells more like one of Target Department Stores High End Cheapies. Its not at all worth its $360 Niche price tag. <br />
<br />
... &amp; finally. After hours of this fragrances Bumbling Symphony of Synthetic Theatrics you're left with a skin scent that smells like a Sweet Cherry Almond Pipe Tobacco inside of a Leather Lined Wooden Box.. Imagine that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2202879"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2202879#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202391" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202391" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IanisAndrei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2166626"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IanisAndrei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202391ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202391" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2166626">IanisAndrei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't understand the hype behind the perfume, it just smells like booze</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2202391"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2202391#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Satpillsbury"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2175906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Satpillsbury" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2175906">Satpillsbury</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is amazing. Needless to say, the performance is absolutely insane, in both the longevity and sillage. <br />
<br />
To me at least, it smells like a boozy and spicy, cherry vanilla scent despite not having it in the notes listed. There's a very slight middle eastern twang to it. <br />
<br />
10/10 fragrance, worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2198091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2198091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195531" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VALOR858"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2173140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="VALOR858" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Absolute-Aphrodisiac-30989.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30989.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolute Aphrodisiac"title="Absolute Aphrodisiac"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173140">VALOR858</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can't get enough of this fragrance. Its a pricey one but I can see myself buying this for the rest of my life. Some people complain about longevity, sillage, and projection. Some even saying the people around them can't smell it until there right next to the skin, but in my experience, it has great longevity, projection, and sillage. The only downside of this fragrance that I can see is it smells similar to narcotic delight, not similar enough to where its redundant to own both but its in the same family I would say. I own both and I find myself reaching for this a lot more. Its what narcotic delight should have been.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2195531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2195531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I'd say the male version of RosendoM 5... * follow me on TikTok @ ScentualP*</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2195381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2195381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MorganaLeFey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MorganaLeFey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Avon/Far-Away-Rebel-50533.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50533.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Far Away Rebel"title="Far Away Rebel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013188">MorganaLeFey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 05:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been my perfume for the last seven months, and I couldn't bring myself to wear anything else.<br />
The first time I smelled it I was... ambarrassed because of how purely carnal this was. I am not used to think about myself as sexy, I am the girl next door and my favorite perfume in the last couple of years has been Dama Bianca (so, airy, luminous and soft) but I don't wear it much because it makes me emotional for God know what reason.<br />
So, fast forward to me deciding I need a new perfume... I wanted something gourmand to wear every day,  elevating, elegant with a dark twist, but in my little journey I stumbled upon this jewel. And as I said before, this one is carnal, raw and vibrant. In the beginning it was difficult to wear because it felt like exposing a part of myself I haven't been much aware of and learing to love it, but this scent has become such a turning point. It's rich, layered, sensual and makes me feel powerful and feminine in a way I never thought a fragrance could do.<br />
Though I enjoy fragrance, this one is what has made me love them, and the way a scent can connect you to feelings or states of the soul completely new.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2191759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2191759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
