Bottle - 5.9/10<br />
Popularity - Fairly Rated</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2185868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2185868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184581" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184581" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nicolespeedyfast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1862186.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nicolespeedyfast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184581ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184581" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862186">nicolespeedyfast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 00:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fell to my knees in Walmart. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2184581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2184581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180747" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bnknowsfrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132381"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2132381.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bnknowsfrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132381">Bnknowsfrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 01:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had very high expectations when I first smelt this, but I dont understand all the hype it gets. Im not saying this is a bad fragrance at all, Im just saying that for 235 you can get something a lot more worth the money. Scents like absolute aphrodisiac or narcotic delight are better and side effect just kinda smells like really sweet cherry calpol. But the dry down is actually quite nice with the spices and tobacco, it has good performance as well. Overall I dont think this is the worth the price or the hype, but it is a nice fragrance.<br />
<br />
Smell 7.6/10<br />
Sillage 8.2/10<br />
Longevity 8.8/10<br />
Bottle 8/10<br />
How much would I pay for it. 140: 90ml</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2180747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2180747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; New batches arent as strong as before but still worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2178368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2178368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177768" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prunel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prunel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Opus-XII-Rose-Incense-74282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opus XII  Rose Incense"title="Opus XII  Rose Incense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223">Prunel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I expected a lot from this fragrance, seeing how praised it is. Well, it's aight. I find it extremely synthetic though. It is very linear, what you first spray is what you'll have for the rest of the wearing experience. I get mostly tobacco with a bit of booze. It's nice, but not great, imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2177768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2177768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176944" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176944" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zmeu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zmeu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176944ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176944" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101575">zmeu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A ngel share with cherry smoke  and tabacco<br />
After is a strong tabacco a high quality one with cinnamon<br />
Nothing new but is nice<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2176944"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2176944#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saboba"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saboba" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Emerald-Mist-81253.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81253.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emerald Mist"title="Emerald Mist"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826523">Saboba</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 01:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelling the spray nozzle it reminds me of sandalwood incense I use around Christmas. The first spray is quite sweet and slightly spicy, which is the cinnamon. But it is not a "realistic" cinnamon for me, a sweet spiciness. After a minute the fragrance settles into something that reminds me more of leather than tobacco. I cannot really smell the Rum note, but it seems I am having a hard time in general smelling Rum notes, so my experience here might be taken with a grain of salt. It's a warm, spicy fragrance with a smooth leathery touch. I personally have to say, that I expected more from this scent. It's nice, but not a sexy, here I am, right in your face scent. I like the Dry Down that brings out the Tobacco on my skin a lot more. The scent lingers on my skin and gives off powdery, sweet, warm, spicy notes. It reminds me a bit of Bath &amp; Body Work's Gingerbread Village from the spice profile. Really interesting. At this point, I'd really go that far and say that it is a more Tobacco prominent Version and overall more intense Version of Gingerbread Village. I'm quite torn here, I am not sure if it's special and intense enough for me to invest in a full size or if it's a pleasant scent, that is nice to try, but somehow it's not outstanding enough to blow me away in an instant. And I want that from perfumes in that price range. <br />
<br />
I just realised, that this scent reminds me somewhat of Jean Paul Gauthier's iconic blue Bottle. It's sure mass appealing.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Sillage: Radiates within an arm length <br />
Longevity: 6h (max)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2176328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2176328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175100" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ParfumGatekeeper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1969077.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ParfumGatekeeper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Seahorse-69386.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69386.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Seahorse"title="Seahorse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969077">ParfumGatekeeper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super fire sweet cherry and boozy fragrance dry down makes me antsy and I start climbing on walls</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2175100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2175100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171524" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eau de Cornichon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eau de Cornichon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Santal-Blush-12766.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12766.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Blush"title="Santal Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753083">Eau de Cornichon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 11:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This doesn't smell like anything special off the tester strip, but when I sprayed this on my skin, HOLY MOTHER OF GOD. <br />
I want to drink this.<br />
<br />
While I can definitely picture all of the listed notes, the dry down specifically reminds me of a crme brle boba coffee from a place near where I live, it's unbelievably decadent and delicious but not overbearingly sweet. <br />
This might be my be-all end-all gourmand. Very few scents make me feel this good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2171524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2171524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The scent has a distinct bite to it and oddly reminds me of a Sharpie. I don't mean this in a bad way; I can see it smelling good on a male, but its not the scent for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2162712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2162712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162221" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaxMiller07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2009062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaxMiller07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2009062">MaxMiller07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Selling side effect private message for more details. Comes in Harrods box to prove authenticity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2162221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2162221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2161896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2161896" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentChimp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1665763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentChimp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2161896ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2161896" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665763">ScentChimp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the price I wanted to be blown away. I wasnt. As with most unisex fragrances this leans too feminine for me. I am working to get most of my unisex niche fragrances out of my collection. Im so over them. Masculine designer fragrances fit my needs way more than overpriced niche and I am not ashamed to admit it. Thank goodness for decant houses. They have saved me from wasting so much money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2161896"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2161896#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160005" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sntiago"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2047146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sntiago" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ajayeb-Dubai-Portrait-84222.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84222.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ajayeb Dubai Portrait"title="Ajayeb Dubai Portrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047146">sntiago</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 08:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the opening is very sweet and boozy, with a sharp biting note in the same way whiskey or rum smells sharp - but that dissipates fast. <br />
<br />
I smell tobacco and something kind of fruity bubblegummy, I feel like something aromatic is in there also. <br />
I do get the cinnamon but it's not necessarily super spicy. <br />
<br />
it's a really good addictive rum and tobacco scent. however after about 15 minutes it's very creamy and sweet and may lean too feminine for some men. and it's still weirdly bubblegummy. <br />
<br />
I'm kind of torn between wether I would wear this myself or would want my boyfriend to wear this. but this kind of smells like what I wanted Pavillon rouge by Jovoy Paris to smell like. <br />
<br />
between this and narcotic delight, it's the superior boozy tobacco scent.<br />
<br />
I haven't smelled or used these before they were allegedly watered down, but they definitely have been. I've seen them around being described as 'beast mode' and it's a very very disappointing sillage and longevity of about 2 hours-3 hours, especially for this price and especially for an evening/date night/special event fragrance that it supposed to be loud and grab attention. <br />
<br />
I'm really debating on wether I should get this and then I remembered that if I have to debate with myself at all, it's not worth getting. there are other scents in this category that will scratch the right itch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2160005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2160005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2154979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2154979" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tubbsLR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2113353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tubbsLR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2154979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2154979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2113353">tubbsLR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-13">05/13/24 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells nothing like Kilian Angel Share. The opening is primarily dominated by Rum and Cherry, while the dry down brings out the cinnamon. Interesting and unique fragrance. Not a safe blind buy, make sure to sample before purchasing. Overall pretty good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2154979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2154979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153560" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151149" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="likeakloss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752119"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="likeakloss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151149ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151149" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); It's a great performer and definitely my one of my go-tos for a cool evening out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2151149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2151149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146897" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Slickster00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2051298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Slickster00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051298">Slickster00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 18:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favourite fragrance and well worth the money. Starts off as a super strong cherry-like booze, which that smoothens out and adds extra sweetness after an hour. The cinnamon then becomes dominant and combines perfectly with the sandalwood. I would hardly say this is a spicy fragrance, though it is definitely underlying in the notes as to not be too sweet and off-putting. Projects for 6-8 hours with strong sillage for the first 3-4, and would not recommend to wear any time other than winter/autumn. In warmer / day time weather it smells like medicine and the spicyness is all gone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2146897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2146897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144741" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144741" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="w0rker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119243"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="w0rker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144741ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144741" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119243">w0rker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A better quality, juicier ultra male. Very sirupy smelling and more on the feminine side. Something to the likes of Baccarat rouge, for me at least. Very potent. It smells purely sweet without any kind of freshness. Kind of linear. I like the scent when it dries down to the base notes - even then it is kind of powerful skin scent but when the strong notes are prominent, those fruity and feminine notes are a turn off for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2144741"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2144741#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143036" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DinoPal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DinoPal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090168">DinoPal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 02:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The reformulation is horrible, its still a nuclear scent but now its completely different. Its an overly spicy headache inducing cherry scent thats nowhere near what it used to be. Vanilla removed, tobacco barely there. Its just so garbage now. Im utterly disappointed. Even jazz club is much better than this piece of shit. Why would initio completely reformulate something that works?! Are they insane? I feel like I got robbed by even buying this. Its also much easier to go noseblind to this. But thank goodness because its garbage that I wanted to scrape off me asap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2143036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2143036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Overpowering for some so I can see why some people dislike it.<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2142411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2142411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; i was expecting something different but its smells amazing, feels a bit generic but not bad at all, 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2142371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2142371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2142030" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="European2024"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2002642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2002642.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="European2024" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Ultra-Male-30947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ultra Male"title="Ultra Male"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2142030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2142030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2002642">European2024</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nursing home smell not my type</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2142030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2142030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141975" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mumenlara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2115646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mumenlara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115646">mumenlara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 03:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can understand why some might find this scent appealing, especially with its masculine-leaning profile.<br />
<br />
However, my experience with it was rather disappointing. The sharp medicinal note, predominantly from the saffron, overshadowed everything else. Personally, I find saffron to be overpowering and unpleasant, even more so than the rum and tobacco notes.<br />
<br />
Overall, I found the fragrance to be too strong and synthetic for my taste. I ended up removing it from my skin and disposing of the sample. Given my aversion to saffron, I won't be giving this fragrance a second chance. It's a hard pass for me. In my opinion, nothing can surpass Absolute Aphrodisiac from this house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2141975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2141975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141961" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="belfa7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="belfa7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509205">belfa7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 03:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The top notes in Side Effect are hypnotising. It doesn't say it online, but there's definitely a top note of jammy red fruits. Straight up boozy spiced rum, tobacco, and raspberry, on a bed of creamy sandalwood. Bold but not at all screechy - alluring, lush, sexy, witchy, ADDICTIVE. <br />
<br />
Longevity is okay - by the end of the night, it entirely disappears on my skin and on my clothing there's just a trace, even with 6+ sprays ... I haven't seen this mentioned a lot but they did reformulate the alcohol percentage from 77% to 80% in the last year or two, and the reformulation is poorer sillage and longevity. <br />
<br />
I wish this was an extrait in a smaller bottle, because the scent itself is 10/10. I spent 6 months trying to find something that I liked as much in terms of that initial hit (but lasted longer!) and I just bought Baraonda by Nasomatto - scratches that sexy, boozy, tobacco (with a hint of sweetness in the form of rose) itch for me. To be honest I would purchase Side Effect if you have money to burn and don't mind overspraying, because it's a masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2141961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2141961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141226" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TomasN21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1778265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TomasN21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-Intense-45396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme Intense"title="Prada L'Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); What i really like is the opening smells like cherry whiskey, then it drydowns into something i smelled before,, im not sure maybe like Bvlgari man in black or something like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2141226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2141226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2139736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gulag Gary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003243"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2003243.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gulag Gary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/Fierce-3508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fierce"title="Fierce"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2139736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2139736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003243">Gulag Gary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 05:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells too feminine for me. It's a great perfume, but it's also overpriced for what it is. Sweet, boozy, cherry note just leans far too feminine. Not worth the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2139736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2139736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138595" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Huss_aladdin27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2104829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Huss_aladdin27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104829">Huss_aladdin27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 20:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The house of initio brings side effect a cherry tobacco bomb!! If your asking me a fragrance for a night out to impress that boozines and scent of this fragrance is surreal my only gripe is the longevity and silage are moderate at best but nice fragrance from initio deserves more hype</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122102" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Landmvrks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445165"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445165.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Landmvrks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Parfum-8282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Parfum"title="Terre d'Hermes Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122102ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122102" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445165">Landmvrks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 00:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Interesting how different noses we have. I absolutely hate the smell of spilled alcohol on furniture or clothes. This smells nothing like it to me. <br />
<br />
Beautiful rum, tobacco is left to the sidelines and creates a sweet layer with something cinnamony there too.<br />
<br />
This is what I thought Replicas Jazz Club would smell like. Beautiful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2122102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2122102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122082" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kanamichelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826307.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kanamichelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826307">Kanamichelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 00:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Boozy?  Yes.  So boozy that it smells like someones house the morning after a drunken party.  You wake up to drinks spilled all over the floors and carpets and cig butts in ashtrays and burn holes in the sofa.   The opening was quite medicinal, followed by the drunken, morning after party in the dry down.  I am so glad I only bought a sample.  I loved Psychedelic Love so much (full bottle worthy!) and having heard so much about Side Effect, that I thought it must be just as good, but nope.  NOPE!  Not only do I not want to smell like this, but would avoid being close to someone who smelled like this.  It also leans more masculine than unisex to my nose.  NOT a safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2122082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2122082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1890097">Harry_11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initio Side Effect is like your secret superpower in a bottle. When you wear it, you're not just anyone  you're "him," the person who gets noticed. It's the perfect scent for those who want to make a statement without saying a word, making it my top pick for any get-together.<br />
<br />
This fragrance sticks with you, ensuring you leave a bit of your vibe behind wherever you go. It's bold, it's cool, and it turns heads  exactly what you want when you're looking to impress that girl you have been dreaming about.<br />
<br />
Rating: 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2121983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2121983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120431" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bugsyiii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.961762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bugsyiii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Fir-Artemisia-97917.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97917.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fir & Artemisia"title="Fir & Artemisia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120431ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120431" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762">bugsyiii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely love the combination of notes in this: warm spicy, rum, tobacco, cinnamon, sweet woody essence that beams from this fragrance. As mentioned (as I own Atomic Rose also), I will be ROCKing the absolute snot outta this fragrance. :) This fragrance, IMO does not lean too sweet that some would not want to wear this. I find the woods and sweetness has the perfect balance that allows many of the other notes to blend well, creating such an aroma!!<br />
<br />
Overall, an amazing unisex fragrance that anybody will feel confident wearing. <br />
<br />
Performance: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 7.5/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10<br />
Compliment: will garner compliments;<br />
Overall: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2120431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2120431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119674" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clay_N"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1677050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clay_N" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Habibi-NY/Honeyed-Tobacco-Oud-68806.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68806.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Honeyed Tobacco & Oud"title="Honeyed Tobacco & Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677050">Clay_N</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 16:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This may be my favorite from Initio. <br />
<br />
It has an almost middle eastern spice to it, with the rum note and light tobacco following. It is blended well and has a transportive quality I love. <br />
<br />
Definitely leans masculine but is well balanced yet still a strong performer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2119674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2119674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
