Not good. Dont smell anything else</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2117144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2117144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115265" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Greennoahf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085629"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2085629.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Greennoahf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085629">Greennoahf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Allure of Initio Parfums Prives: Exploring the Enigmatic Side Effects<br />
<br />
In the realm of fine fragrances, Initio Parfums Prives has emerged as a distinguished name, revered for its innovative compositions and captivating allure. Among its esteemed collection is the enigmatic fragrance known as "Side Effect." This essay embarks on a journey to explore the nuances and appeal of Initio's Side Effect, delving into its unique characteristics and the captivating sensations it evokes.<br />
<br />
Initio Parfums Prives embodies a philosophy that blends artistry with mystique, seeking to awaken primal instincts and evoke profound emotions through scent. Side Effect, one of the brand's standout creations, exemplifies this ethos with its distinctive blend of notes that unfold like a mysterious narrative on the skin.<br />
<br />
At first encounter, Side Effect strikes with a bold opening, characterized by the crispness of bergamot and the warmth of amberwood. This initial impression sets the stage for what unfolds as a complex olfactory experience. As the fragrance evolves, nuances of patchouli and vetiver emerge, lending a deep earthiness that contrasts intriguingly with the earlier brightness. This interplay of elements creates a dynamic and multifaceted aroma that evolves uniquely on each wearer.<br />
<br />
What truly sets Side Effect apart, however, is its "side effects" on the senses. The fragrance has an uncanny ability to evoke memories and stir emotions, transcending mere olfactory pleasure. Many who encounter this scent report experiencing a surge of confidence or a heightened sense of allurean intangible effect that is as captivating as it is elusive.<br />
<br />
The allure of Side Effect lies in its versatility. It can be worn with equal ease during the day or night, adapting effortlessly to different moods and occasions. Whether it's a formal gathering or a casual outing, this fragrance leaves a lasting impression, like an invisible cloak of sophistication and allure.<br />
<br />
Initio Parfums Prives is also renowned for its craftsmanship and attention to detail. Side Effect, like all its counterparts, is meticulously crafted using the finest ingredients sourced from around the globe. Each element is carefully selected and blended to achieve a harmonious composition that resonates with wearers on a deeply personal level.<br />
<br />
Moreover, the unique "side effects" associated with this fragrance speak to its transformative power. Beyond its aesthetic appeal, Side Effect becomes an intimate companion, capable of influencing not just how one smells but also how one feels. This interplay between scent and emotion is a testament to the artistry behind Initio Parfums Prives.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, Initio's Side Effect stands as a testament to the transformative power of fragrance. It goes beyond merely scenting the skin; it becomes a catalyst for evoking emotions and memories. With its captivating blend of notes and its mysterious allure, Side Effect exemplifies the ethos of Initio Parfums Privesto create fragrances that resonate deeply with the wearer's soul</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2115265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2115265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Not worth the hype!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="2111168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=2111168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If Narcotic Delight is sweet and relatively innocent Side Effect is a slutty, hot mess.  <br />

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1077940">morinatk04</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-05">04/05/20 21:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok, bought it blindly without testing first, based on many positive reviews as well as high recommendation of Demi Rawling on youtube...big mistake! Idk why everyone is going crazy about it!? First of all it is very masculine, on me I smelled man all day long, hated it! Yes it is super strong, and yes good quality perfume, dont over do it this is super strong staff! I prefer psychedelic Love though. Bad idea purchasing expensive perfumes based on someone else's taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1161193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1161193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1408919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1408919" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noeul92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370855"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370855.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noeul92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1408919ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1408919" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370855">Noeul92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-12">09/12/21 03:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has received a lot of love from the fragrance community since its release. So, I thought it would be a relatively safe blind-buy. I got it and I wasn't too pleased. I didn't know what to expect, but it sure wasn't this - never smelled anything like it. The branding and the purple bottle made me think the scent was something out of the occult. I'm religious so I thought I was smelling something against my belief. <br />
<br />
Every now and again, I took it out to smell the atomiser because it was strange to me. Little did I know I was acquiring a taste for it. I decided to give it a wearing as winter came around and my mind has changed. Although the opening is still odd to me, I now find it interesting. It is well-crafted and continues to develop on skin. I love the combination of the tobacco with the rum and the sweetness of the vanilla running throughout.<br />
<br />
One of top two offerings from Initio Parfums.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1408919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1408919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1130203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1130203" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ovais.saleem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/290453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.290453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ovais.saleem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azman/Majnoon-71828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Majnoon"title="Majnoon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1130203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1130203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/290453">ovais.saleem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-02">01/02/20 11:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Notes: Tobacco, Vanilla, Rum and Cinnamon<br />
<br />
A gorgeous boozy, creamy vanilla and a spicy concoction. Opens with a fruity note (Cherry), not a fan of the opening but this last for a good 15 mins and then the hard hitting notes start to show their true power, Cinnamon, Vanilla, Tobacco and Rum. This is an Intoxicating fragrance, sexy, rich and potent. In the dry-down I also get hints of Coffee which is not listed as a note. Love this masterpiece.<br />
.<br />
.<br />
Instagram: ovaissaleem_</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1130203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1130203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1383627" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1383627" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="P-Nay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1364846.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="P-Nay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1383627ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1383627" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364846">P-Nay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-29">07/29/21 17:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initio Siide Effect can cause "Side Effects"- which include:<br />
*  Constant wrist smelling<br />
*  Opened Nostrils <br />
*  Awakened Senses <br />
*  Body and Skin with a pleasant aroma<br />
*  confidence <br />
*  Intoxication <br />
*  Compliments<br />
This smokey, sugar-coated, rich smelling, acutely voluptuous, lonnnnnnng lasting fragrance will have you looking crazybecause you will without-a-doubt succumb to non-stop eye rolling from the breathtaking aroma, by reason of constant"wrist sniffing!  I've been overtaken, have fallen victim and can't escape.  I think I'm intoxicated!  Maybe it's from, the Rum .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1383627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1383627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="42260" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784778" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PurpleShadow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237313"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1237313.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PurpleShadow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784778ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784778" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237313">PurpleShadow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-16">03/16/23 05:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want to smell like an extremely attractive 400-year-old vampire who has many toxic traits/red flags, you can wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1784778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1784778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1975397" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="electricwitchard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="electricwitchard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1975397ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1975397" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561732">electricwitchard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-13">11/13/23 01:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lesson in getting a tester first. Ive wanted to smell this beautiful bottle for about two years, obsessed over the reviews and the notes were everything I wanted and always loved. ALMOST blind bought many times, but talked myself out of it. The tester arrived today and I am heartbroken. Its burning plastic and cola syrup. It smells so synthetic to me. I am happy (see: jealous) of everyone who this smells good on, but my nose and my skin cannot stand this. The only one happy is my bank account. <br />
<br />
Always, always, always test. Not blind buy safe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1975397"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1975397#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945613" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received a decant from a brick and mortar vendor of the Initio line. My blind first impressions: <br />
<br />
This can't be right. I am getting a very mild minimalist rose accord, ionones, ambrocenide, ambroxan, timberol, coumarin, safraleine, ethyl maltol, ethyl vanillin. <br />
<br />
Coumarin (tonka, hay, flouve), alpha isomethyl ionone (violet, wood), citronellol and geraniol (roses, geranium) are allergens and are indeed listed in the ingredients list as required by cosmetics law, at least partially confirming that I am not entirely wrong. To give the benefit of doubt, these materials can sometimes be present in small doses in other compositions.<br />
<br />
I really don't get rum or tobacco on skin, but on fabric there are mild suggestions of sweet dryness and syrupiness that could be interpreted as a cartoonish Tom&amp;Jerry take on a tobacco and rum note. <br />
<br />
I'm sorry, but the truth needs to be spoken. There are some excellent modern fragrances available today, but Initio and Parfums de Marly are some of the weakest contenders for originality, quality and the price point. They do have excellent bottle design, projection and longevity, but really poor complexity and unoriginal. <br />
<br />
I have had the same impression with PdM bottles tested at Nordstrom - it honestly feels like Lattafa does better at 10x less cost. Initio/PdM have no business charging $400 for what smells like generic designer fragrances in fancier bottles and packaging.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1945613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1945613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1584544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1584544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ty/dc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ty/dc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1584544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1584544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); Its a ok scent, It just doesnt meet the high expectations I had for it. <br />
<br />
There are so many other tobacco/warm/boozy type scents on the market that I much prefer; Herod, Naxos, Jazz Club, Man In Black, just to name a few.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1584544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1584544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905750" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AleMHS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1184210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AleMHS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Nectarine-Blossom-Honey-3782.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3782.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nectarine Blossom & Honey"title="Nectarine Blossom & Honey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184210">AleMHS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-18">08/18/23 20:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so aggressively strong and synthetic to me, I have difficulty leaving it on for more than 5 minutes. Almost like a punch in the face. <br />
<br />
I get rum, vanilla, and cough syrup in the worst sort of way. One of those scents thats unfortunately an instant migraine. Needless to say, not to my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42260"comment_id="1905750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html?ccid=1905750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="42260" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
